definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
to pluck (a string)/to play (a string instrument)/to spring or leap/to shoot (e.g. with a catapult)/(of cotton) to fluff or tease/to flick/to flip/to accuse/to impeach/elastic (of materials)

sentences.english: Police in flak jackets are patrolling the districts hit by the violence.
sentences.chinese: 身穿防弹衣的警察正在遭受暴力攻击的地段巡逻。

sentences.english: The personal clothing of this soldier of the future would be lightweight with a bullet-proof jacket.
sentences.chinese: 未来士兵的服装重量将更轻，并装备防弹背心。

sentences.english: I hold the Cupid's arrow chasing you, you're wearing a bulletproof vest to fly.
sentences.chinese: 我举着丘比特的箭追呀追，你穿着防弹背心飞呀飞。

sentences.english: and to make really bullet-proof vests.
sentences.chinese: 还可以制造真正的防弹背心。

sentences.english: " Ballproof bust bodice " publish the proposal that comes from a policewoman.
sentences.chinese: “防弹胸罩”的出台来自一名女警察的建议。

sentences.english: Bulletproof helmets are widely used to prevent bullets and fragments.
sentences.chinese: 防弹头盔通常用以防子弹或破片。

sentences.english: The Taliban like it because it pierces body armour.
sentences.chinese: 塔利班喜欢它是因为它能打穿防弹衣。

sentences.english: After the explosion, Cheney said he was briefly moved to a bomb shelter.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸发生后，钱尼说，他一度被转移到防弹设施内。

sentences.english: However, Doc reveals he was wearing a bulletproof vest after reading the letter.
sentences.chinese: 幸好博士因为读过马蒂的信，事先穿了一件防弹服。

sentences.english: You want to tighten up the kevlar, OK? All right. Offer still stands.
sentences.chinese: 你应该穿防弹衣的，好吗？好吧，飞机的事别忘了。

sentences.english: The five agents are encased in body armor and are toting semiautomatic weapons.
sentences.chinese: 五个身着防弹衣的特工手持半自动武器。

sentences.english: This product represents that they have entered into a bullet-proof clothing market.
sentences.chinese: 这种产品代表着他们已正式进入防弹服市场。

sentences.english: Also known as body armors , there are different types of bullet proof vests .
sentences.chinese: 也称为身体盔甲等，有许多不同类型的防弹背心。

sentences.english: The NRA was even against banning cop-killer bullets.
sentences.chinese: 全国步枪协会甚至反对禁止能穿透防弹背心的子弹。

sentences.english: The behind contains some pain, although has super mighty bullet-proof vest.
sentences.chinese: 背后有一点痛，不过有着超强的防弹背心。

sentences.english: His Hollywood movies include "Anna and the King" and " Bulletproof Monk".
sentences.chinese: 他在好莱坞拍摄的电影包括安娜与国王和防弹武僧。
